Text: Rethat sounds good and i can find circuit city funny guy why dont you go get it if you know what it is do they not have circuit cities in houston i think not or we could order it online or something i have internet access and savvy i think me and miller are going to check out waco vs john tyler tomorrow to do some scouting aaron ross derrick johnson etc what you know about that PM To cc Subject Re If I send you on a trip to Circuit City do you think you can find it I saw a couple of good stereos that I thought would go well for Dad in the garage They looked pretty nice and were less than I figured we could go in together and get him something like that I thought that would be better than a shirt or something Im going to go look at them again tomorrow and I can give you some more specifics on AM To cc Subject Re i dont know whats up with the pictures i think mom was going over there this week to look at them and then i thought you were going to get an email with the pared down list ive been out of the loop lately working too much is To AM cc Subject Whats the deal with the pictures I need your home number to talk to you about Christmas stuff Note The information contained Related LA Times articleForwarded by Craig J DeanSouthwestAUDITEYLLPUS on AM From Randy A Hyzak on PM AABS Audit Phone Number Cell Phone EYComm To Craig J YNAmerica Ryan YNAmerica Bill L YNAmerica Michael E YNAmerica Jason A YNAmerica cc Subject Related LA Times article Forwarded by Randy A HyzakSouthwestAUDITEYLLPUS on PM on PM To Randy A YNAmerica Internet cc Subject Related LA Times article LA TIMES HAS UT AND ON THE CUSP OF ANOTHER DYNASTY Big Talent and Soft Schedule Have Him Hooked on Horns CHRIS DUFRESNE Times Staff Writer AUSTIN Texas They havent cleared ground yet for the presidential helipad but its starting to feel a bit like the days when coach Darrell K Royal roamed the sidelines and Lyndon Baines Johnson literally dropped into Texas Memorial Stadium We always knew when he was coming because we could hear the helicopter Royal says of LBJ The Texas band would play Hail to the Chief He loved that At Royal cant shoot his age anymore but he still shoots a pretty good breeze He is standing next to his cart at the Barton Creek Golf Club regaling visitors with tall Texas tales When we were really jellyrolling it it was an exciting time Royal says Then like time Texas football slipped away It has been years since Royal retired and years since he coached the last of three national championship teams in Royal didnt figure to last long enough to see the revival let alone be a part of it But after a quartercentury of being a football plain state Texas has gone retro Royal has been summoned back from the pasture he had been put out to Texan George W Bush is electoral votes short of reclaiming the White House and Longhorn football may be on the cusp of another dynasty Pay no mind to the Associated Press preseason poll or the coaches annual weathervane tally Texas is No Yeah we knowTexas Coach Mack Brown cant believe it either Were in the top in most polls and we lost our last three games Brown says Dont bother us with details Mack its time to toot your Longhorns We say this knowing Texas may actually be a year away There are holes to fill at wide receiver and a quarterback controversy brewing between Major Applewhite and Chris Simms But cosmically this is the year Bush and Texas can go over the top together The Longhorns have starters returning from last years team and are still socksorting through three of the best recruiting loads in history In two years Brown has shaken Texas football to its core not to mention just about every hand in the state The schedule is softer than those box springs over in Sealy In a controversial move Texas backed out of a seasonopening game at muchimproved Hawaii and instead will play host to Louisiana Lafayette Texas also misses Kansas State and Nebraska in Big Conference play faces upstart Oklahoma in Dallas on Oct and gets archrival Texas AM on Nov in Austin If the Longhorns can sidestep a couple of potholesat Stanford on Sept at Colorado on Oct they could be headed into a potential Dec Big title game showdown against powerhouse Nebraska Brown faced a similar scenario three years ago at North Carolina when his Tar Heels needed only a home victory against Florida State to reach the title game We had everything there except we werent ready to win the game Brown says Florida State scorched the Tar Heels at Chapel Hill and North Carolina finished No in the final coaches poll The difference this time is that Texas may be the one team not intimidated by Nebraska The Longhorns handed the Cornhuskers their only loss last year and thumped Nebraska two years ago in Lincoln In the Big title game of course John Mackovics Texas team stunned No Nebraska in one of the decades greatest games Our kids like that game Brown says They respect them but are not intimidated They want to be in that game So what happened Bevo There is no good excuse for Texas football ever going sour Its like Napa Valley not being able to produce grapes Texas has been a football hotbed for years It is the states collegiate football program with unparalleled interest talent and funding Fred Akers who succeeded Royal had his moments but never seemed to get the right bounce A heartwrenching Cotton Bowl loss to Georgia in the seasonender cost Texas the national title Then came the Texas flustep Texas went from through under Akers and David McWilliams and in six years under Mackovic in the s Texas hasnt been ranked No in the AP since Oct Bill Little an athletic department publicity man since has witnessed firsthand the fall from grace Anger is one thing Little says but when it was apathy thats when I thought wed never get it back Some blame the decline on rampant cheating that pervaded the Southwest Conference in the s Texas emerged relatively unscathed We were in a world then when people played by a different set of rules DeLoss Dodds the schools athletic director since says We just werent getting the players And we let our facilities slip Though he turned out to be the wrong coach Mackovic at least deserves credit for spearheading a fiveyear million makeover that has left Texas with jawdropping facilities Something else was missing all those years though Someone actually Darrell Royal For reasons that remain clouded Texas pushed Royal aside in he was not even allowed on the search committee that led to Akers hiring What did Royal contribute In years his Texas teams won SWC titles and national championships in and In he and his staff developed the Wishbone offense a quadruplethreat run offense that propelled Texas to wins in a row and consecutive national titles It was Royal who one summer taught the Wishbone to Alabamas Bear Bryant But an old cowboy was allowed to fade into the sunset I really dont like to talk about what happened in between Royal says of the dark years Id rather stay current It might not come out right It didnt take Brown long to turn over tables One of his first acts after replacing Mackovic in was restoring Royal to the royal court During an early Texas practice in the Brown regime Royal asked the new coach if it was OK to talk to one of his players I said Yeah you can talk to him Brown says The stadiums named after you you can do whatever you want Brown in turn extracted from Royal the nuances and politics of Texas football When Brown asked Will you help me with the Texas tradition the old coachs face turned a Royal flush I knew we had something special then Royal says He knew where his priorities were Royal told Brown to keep his nose out of state politics He instructed Brown about dealing with Texas fans Whether you like it or not they need to think you like it He told Brown that Texas was like no other football creature The good news is people really care at Texas Royal told Brown The bad news is that people really care about Texas Royal wont forget Browns entrance on the Texas stage Before addressing the media at his introductory news conference Brown stopped in the hallway and called Eddie Joseph executive vice president of the states High School Coaches Assn In a sense that was more the nuts and bolts of the football program rather than the press conference Royal says Brown has since thrown up a recruiting wall around Texas He has either visited or written all of Texas prep coaches Hes absolutely the best PR guy Ive ever run across Royal says This year Brown turned down speaking engagements and transformed the schools football athletic complex into a monument to Texas football Instead of Muzak athletic department elevators chime The Eyes of Texas Are Upon You the schools fabled fight song Former Texas Heisman trophy winner Earl Campbell watches home games seated in one of six real saddles perched in the players private lounge in Texas Memorial Stadium Macks idea Texas has sold season tickets this year despite not playing Oklahoma Kansas State or Nebraska at home Its coming its around the corner DeLoss says of Texas return to glory And its the real thing Theres nothing like a quarterback controversy to screw up a potential dynasty In Austin its the talk of Sixth Streets rooftop eateries Applewhite or Simms Simms or Applewhite I was in a gas station Simms said And I go to pay the guy and he says Youre that Simms kid right You going to beat out Applewhite Hey what better place than a gas station to pump for information Simms the sophomore son of former New York Giant quarterback Phil Simms is Texas most heralded recruit since Heisman Trophy winner Ricky Williams The USA Today high school player of the year Simms reneged on a commitment to Tennessee and instead chose Texas Simms says Tennessee wanted to redshirt him he wanted to play right away But as a true freshman last year Simms could not displace the sophomore Applewhite who set singleseason school records while throwing for yards and touchdowns Simms threw passes in seven games Now what Applewhite tore the ligaments in his left knee during the Cotton Bowl an injury he guessed could be used for an excuse to usher in the Simms era The college game is a business Applewhite says But Applewhite made it his business to get his left knee back to which he say it is How does Brown have the race handicapped Both parents like their son better than they like the other parents son he says Brown says both quarterbacks will play He faced a similar quandary at North Carolina when he successfully platooned Chris Keldorf and Oscar Davenport But Simms a foot sophomore is already antsy knowing he probably would have been starting this year had he gone to Tennessee Yep Simms says Thats the choice I made and I live with it But Im happy here beyond belief Simms knows quarterback controversies hes still bitter about Scott Brunner beating his dad out for the Giants starting job in Bill Parcells chickened out Chris says of the Giants former coach Simms is guessing one man is going to end up with the job I cant see it going through the season he says of the platoon system I dont think it could work It creates too much turmoil for the team Simms and Applewhite appear to be good friends and both insist they will not let this become a wedge issue on a team There is not going to be any Chris camps because I wont let that happen Simms says Applewhite says the quarterbacks cant do it alone Itll take a lot more than Chris Simms and I to handle it right he says There are a lot of friends involved loyalties Brown says this story will be played out peacefully Im not going to let a pouting quarterback ruin our season he says Applewhite notes that no Texas quarterback since has started and finished the same season Darrell Royal hasnt taken sides on the quarterback issue but has offered Brown a bit of general advice Brown Darrell says that if you got it you make it If you dont got it you wont make it And if you dont know what it is you havent got a chance Our theme for this year is it Note The information contained in this message may be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please notify us immediately by replying to the message and deleting it from your computer Thank you Ernst Young LLP

FW williams and BJa little propaganda some of this might be old but its still fun to read Forwarded by Craig J DeanSouthwestAUDITEYLLPUS on AM From Randy A Hyzak on AM AABS Audit Phone Number Cell Phone EYComm To Craig J YNAmerica Ryan YNAmerica cc Subject FW williams and BJ Thought you boys may enjoy Forwarded by Randy A HyzakSouthwestAUDITEYLLPUS on AM on AM To Randy A YNAmerica Internet cc Subject FW williams and BJ Original Message From Martin Shannon Sent Thursday August AM To Andy Michel Email Barry Goss Email Chris Cole Email Dwayne Hyzak Fritz Boehm Email Jason Kroll Email Jeff Deatsman Email Jess Morris Email Kendall Bowlin Email Kristi Fenton Email Mik Hogan Email Ray Cole Email Subject FW williams and BJ attunk ATTtxt Shannon Martin wk c Quanta Services Inc NYSE PWR Post Oak Blvd St Houston Tx Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday August AM To Subject FW williams and BJ Dont tell me this doesnt get you excitedtrue or notmore likely than notdammit i hate waitingat least I get to see him FRIDAY Forwarded by Pradeep RaoCHASE on AM on AM To Pradeep HASE cc Subject FW williams and BJ from a friend in Austin The uncut version i went to both the am and the pm practices yesterday and let me rerereiterate that we have a great group of receivers and that the stud dog bad ass mofo of the group is roy williams he is physically way beyond not only vasher and the walkon CBs trying to cover him but the rest of the college ranks ahmad brooks was standing by him in street clothes and there aint a chance he could stop roy roy flies past people and gets way the fuck up there and takes the ball out of the clouds hes a fucking randy moss but you know what hes bigger than randy moss and as fast as randy moss and probably has as good a vertical as randy moss Moss height weight lbs speed vertical Roy height weight lbs speed speed high jump long jump we may just have the next superhuman WR on our team pray for no injuries im going to the pm practice today too got a hardon just thinking about roy probably will see a few NFL GMs there and the other WRs are spectacular too sloan is and does well at establishing and holding position vs the cover man BJ is and has really soft hands i watched BJ vasher and jeffrey field punts each at yds with a cross wind in the pm session vasher and jeffrey had technical problems and bobbled or dropped almost half BJ never bobbled or dropped one as soon as its close he just sucks it in and takes off and thats how he catches balls on the crossing routes vacuum hands its going to be unfuckingreal a year or two down the road when these guys have experience and simms gets to throw to them on the field three at a time you cant doubleteam them all put simply i think the days of our using white WRs are over Note The information contained in this message may be privileged and confidential and protected from disclosure If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or an employee or agent responsible for delivering this message to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this Michael E YNAmerica Jason A YNAmerica cc Subject Related LA Times article Forwarded by Randy A HyzakSouthwestAUDITEYLLPUS on PM on PM To Randy A YNAmerica Internet cc Subject Related LA Times article LA TIMES HAS UT AND ON THE CUSP OF ANOTHER DYNASTY Big Talent and Soft Schedule Have Him Hooked on Horns CHRIS DUFRESNE Times Staff Writer AUSTIN Texas They havent cleared ground yet for the presidential helipad but its starting to feel a bit like the days when coach Darrell K Royal roamed the sidelines and Lyndon Baines Johnson literally dropped into Texas Memorial Stadium We always knew when he was coming because we could hear the helicopter Royal says of LBJ The Texas band would play Hail to the Chief He loved that At Royal cant shoot his age anymore but he still shoots a pretty good breeze He is standing next to his cart at the Barton Creek Golf Club regaling visitors with tall Texas tales When we were really jellyrolling it it was an exciting time Royal says Then like time Texas football slipped away It has been years since Royal retired and years since he coached the last of three national championship teams in Royal didnt figure to last long enough to see the revival let alone be a part of it But after a quartercentury of being a football plain state Texas has gone retro Royal has been summoned back from the pasture he had been put out to Texan George W Bush is electoral votes short of reclaiming the White House and Longhorn football may be on the cusp of another dynasty Pay no mind to the Associated Press preseason poll or the coaches annual weathervane tally Texas is No Yeah we knowTexas Coach Mack Brown cant believe it either Were in the top in most polls and we lost our last three games Brown says Dont bother us with details Mack its time to toot your Longhorns We say this knowing Texas may actually be a year away There are holes to fill at wide receiver and a quarterback controversy brewing between Major Applewhite and Chris Simms But cosmically this is the year Bush and Texas can go over the top together The Longhorns have starters returning from last years team and are still socksorting through three of the best recruiting loads in history In two years Brown has shaken Texas football to its core not to mention just about every hand in the state The schedule is softer than those box springs over in Sealy In a controversial move Texas backed out of a seasonopening game at muchimproved Hawaii and instead will play host to Louisiana Lafayette Texas also misses Kansas State and Nebraska in Big Conference play faces upstart Oklahoma in Dallas on Oct and gets archrival Texas AM on Nov in Austin If the Longhorns can sidestep a couple of potholesat Stanford on Sept at Colorado on Oct they could be headed into a potential Dec Big title game showdown against powerhouse Nebraska Brown faced a similar scenario three years ago at North Carolina when his Tar Heels needed only a home victory against Florida State to reach the title game We had everything there except we werent ready to win the game Brown says Florida State scorched the Tar Heels at Chapel Hill and North Carolina finished No in the final coaches poll The difference this time is that Texas may be the one team not intimidated by Nebraska The Longhorns handed the Cornhuskers their only loss last year and thumped Nebraska two years ago in Lincoln In the Big title game of course John Mackovics Texas team stunned No Nebraska in one of the decades greatest games Our kids like that game Brown says They respect them but are not intimidated They want to be in that game So what happened Bevo There is no good excuse for Texas football ever going sour Its like Napa Valley not being able to produce grapes Texas has been a football hotbed for years It is the states collegiate football program with unparalleled interest talent and funding Fred Akers who succeeded Royal had his moments but never seemed to get the right bounce A heartwrenching Cotton Bowl loss to Georgia in the seasonender cost Texas the national title Then came the Texas flustep Texas went from through under Akers and David McWilliams and in six years under Mackovic in the s Texas hasnt been ranked No in the AP since Oct Bill Little an athletic department publicity man since has witnessed firsthand the fall from grace Anger is one thing Little says but when it was apathy thats when I thought wed never get it back Some blame the decline on rampant cheating that pervaded the Southwest Conference in the s Texas emerged relatively unscathed We were in a world then when people played by a different set of rules DeLoss Dodds the schools athletic director since says We just werent getting the players And we let our facilities slip Though he turned out to be the wrong coach Mackovic at least deserves credit for spearheading a fiveyear million makeover that has left Texas with jawdropping facilities Something else was missing all those years though Someone actually Darrell Royal For reasons that remain clouded Texas pushed Royal aside in he was not even allowed on the search committee that led to Akers hiring What did Royal contribute In years his Texas teams won SWC titles and national championships in and In he and his staff developed the Wishbone offense a quadruplethreat run offense that propelled Texas to wins in a row and consecutive national titles It was Royal who one summer taught the Wishbone to Alabamas Bear Bryant But an old cowboy was allowed to fade into the sunset I really dont like to talk about what happened in between Royal says of the dark years Id rather stay current It might not come out right It didnt take Brown long to turn over tables One of his first acts after replacing Mackovic in was restoring Royal to the royal court During an early Texas practice in the Brown regime Royal asked the new coach if it was OK to talk to one of his players I said Yeah you can talk to him Brown says The stadiums named after you you can do whatever you want Brown in turn extracted from Royal the nuances and politics of Texas football When Brown asked Will you help me with the Texas tradition the old coachs face turned a Royal flush I knew we had something special then Royal says He knew where his priorities were Royal told Brown to keep his nose out of state politics He instructed Brown about dealing with Texas fans Whether you like it or not they need to think you like it He told Brown that Texas was like no other football creature The good news is people really care at Texas Royal told Brown The bad news is that people really care about Texas Royal wont forget Browns entrance on the Texas stage Before addressing the media at his introductory news conference Brown stopped in the hallway and called Eddie Joseph executive vice president of the states High School Coaches Assn In a sense that was more the nuts and bolts of the football program rather than the press conference Royal says Brown has since thrown up a recruiting wall around Texas He has either visited or written all of Texas prep coaches Hes absolutely the best PR guy Ive ever run across Royal says This year Brown turned down speaking engagements and transformed the schools football athletic complex into a monument to Texas football Instead of Muzak athletic department elevators chime The Eyes of Texas Are Upon You the schools fabled fight song Former Texas Heisman trophy winner Earl Campbell watches home games seated in one of six real saddles perched in the players private lounge in Texas Memorial Stadium Macks idea Texas has sold season tickets this year despite not playing Oklahoma Kansas State or Nebraska at home Its coming its around the corner DeLoss says of Texas return to glory And its the real thing Theres nothing like a quarterback controversy to screw up a potential dynasty In Austin its the talk of Sixth Streets rooftop eateries Applewhite or Simms Simms or Applewhite I was in a gas station Simms said And I go to pay the guy and he says Youre that Simms kid right You going to beat out Applewhite Hey what better place than a gas station to pump for information Simms the sophomore son of former New York Giant quarterback Phil Simms is Texas most heralded recruit since Heisman Trophy winner Ricky Williams The USA Today high school player of the year Simms reneged on a commitment to Tennessee and instead chose Texas Simms says Tennessee wanted to redshirt him he wanted to play right away But as a true freshman last year Simms could not displace the sophomore Applewhite who set singleseason school records while throwing for yards and touchdowns Simms threw passes in seven games Now what Applewhite tore the ligaments in his left knee during the Cotton Bowl an injury he guessed could be used for an excuse to usher in the Simms era The college game is a business Applewhite says But Applewhite made it his business to get his left knee back to which he say it is How does Brown have the race handicapped Both parents like their son better than they like the other parents son he says Brown says both quarterbacks will play He faced a similar quandary at North Carolina when he successfully platooned Chris Keldorf and Oscar Davenport But Simms a foot sophomore is already antsy knowing he probably would have been starting this year had he gone to Tennessee Yep Simms says Thats the choice I made and I live with it But Im happy here beyond belief Simms knows quarterback controversies hes still bitter about Scott Brunner beating his dad out for the Giants starting job in Bill Parcells chickened out Chris says of the Giants former coach Simms is guessing one man is going to end up with the job I cant see it going through the season he says of the platoon system I dont think it could work It creates too much turmoil for the team Simms and Applewhite appear to be good friends and both insist they will not let this become a wedge issue on a team There is not going to be any Chris camps because I wont let that happen Simms says Applewhite says the quarterbacks cant do it alone Itll take a lot more than Chris Simms and I to handle it right he says There are a lot of friends involved loyalties Brown says this story will be played out peacefully Im not going to let a pouting quarterback ruin our season he says Applewhite notes that no Texas quarterback since has started and finished the same season Darrell Royal hasnt taken sides on the quarterback issue but has offered Brown a bit of general advice Brown Darrell says that if you got it you make it If you dont got it you wont make it And if you dont know what it is you havent got a chance Our theme for this year is it Note The information contained in this message may be privileged and confidential and
